<<
<<echo
echo<<
<<echo<<
echo<<echo
echo << hello
<< echo << hello
<< echo <<
<<echo<<hello
echo<<hello<<echo
hello << echo << hello
"       "
<<
<<"   "
"   "<<
<<"   "<<
"   "<<"   "
echo
echo hello

<
<echo
echo<
<echo<
echo<echo
echo < hello
< echo < hello
< echo <
<echo<hello
echo<hello<echo
hello < echo < hello
"       "
<
<"   "
"   "<
<"   "<
"   "<"   "
echo
echo hello

|
|echo
echo|
|echo|
echo|echo
echo | hello
| echo | hello
| echo |
|echo|hello
echo|hello|echo
hello | echo | hello
"       "
|
|"   "
"   "|
|"   "|
"   "|"   "
echo
echo hello
